text: Greg Eagles (born October 28, 1970) is an American actor known for voicing Aku Aku from the Crash Bandicoot franchise and the Grim Reaper from Grim & Evil and it's spin-off The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy. ==Filmography== * Metal Gear Solid (1998) * Lobo (2000) * Grim & Evil (2001-2003) * The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy (2003-2008) * The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy (video game) (2006) * Billy & Mandy's Big Boogey Adventure (2007) * Billy & Mandy: Wrath of the Spider Queen (2007) * Crash of the Titans (2007) * Crash: Mind over Mutant (2008) * Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy (2017) * Crash Team Racing: Nitro-Fueled (2019) * Crash Bandicoot 4: It's About Time (2020) ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:African-American voice actors Category:American video game actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Milwaukee Category:Living people
title: Greg Eagles
